title: Pastel Garden Blend – A Soft Harmony of Blooms
description: An elegant medley of blush roses, ivory lisianthus, and light blue delphiniums, softened by airy pampas grass and accented with thistle blooms and hypericum berries. Framed in a cascade of lush greenery, this arrangement is a romantic expression of garden-inspired refinement - perfect for modern weddings with a classic floral soul.

title: Ethereal Blue – Soft Garden Romance in Bloom
description: A romantic composition of powder blue hydrangeas, white lisianthus, and soft cream roses, nestled gently among clouds of baby’s breath and flowing eucalyptus foliage. This floral ensemble blends timeless charm with modern minimalism — ideal for garden weddings, coastal receptions, or elegant outdoor affairs

title: Timeless Romance: Elegant Floral & Candlelight Wedding Decor
description: Our signature arrangements feature lush bouquets of soft blush and ivory roses, delicate white dahlias, and fresh greenery, artfully designed to create a romantic and sophisticated atmosphere. Accentuated by modern geometric candle holders to each table

title: Elegant Floral Wedding Centerpiece
description: Elevate your wedding with this stunning centerpiece featuring lush white roses, hydrangeas, and soft peach blooms, accented with cascading eucalyptus in a chic gold geometric holder. Expect a sophisticated tablescape with candles for a warm ambiance

title: Serene Blue & White Wedding Centerpiece
description: showcasing vibrant blue hydrangeas, white roses, and chrysanthemums, complemented by lush eucalyptus in a modern holder. Expect a harmonious tablescape with tall candles, ideal for a sophisticated outdoor or indoor setting.

title: Timeless Floral Charm Decor
description: featuring lush white roses, delicate eucalyptus leaves, and vibrant red accents, beautifully arranged in elegant urns and vases. Enhance the ambiance with rustic pampas grass in wicker baskets and sophisticated candelabras adorned with soft pink blooms, creating a perfect blend of classic and modern styles for your unforgettable ceremony and reception.

title: Exquisite White Floral Elegance
description: showcasing pristine white roses, lush chrysanthemums, delicate baby’s breath, and vibrant green foliage, all elegantly displayed in modern geometric glass lanterns with glowing candles. Perfect for creating a romantic and sophisticated atmosphere at your ceremony or reception.
